OEM Services

Custom OEM Manufacturing

From concept to volume production, we deliver fully customized terminal wire solutions tailored to your exact specifications. Work directly with the factory for better control, pricing, and quality.

01 Complete Customization

Connector Customization

  • ▸ JST PH/XH/EH series compatibility
  • ▸ Molex Micro-Fit, PicoBlade equivalents
  • ▸ TE AMP, AMPSEAL alternatives
  • ▸ Fully custom connector development
  • ▸ Mixed connector configurations

Wire & Cable Customization

  • ▸ Any gauge (32 AWG to 10 AWG)
  • ▸ Custom cable lengths and configurations
  • ▸ Shielded and unshielded options
  • ▸ Multi-conductor assemblies
  • ▸ Special materials (silicone, Teflon)

Assembly Customization

  • ▸ Breakout configurations
  • ▸ Multi-branch designs
  • ▸ Integrated connectors and components
  • ▸ Overmolded assemblies
  • ▸ Labeling and marking options

Termination Customization

  • ▸ Crimp terminations
  • ▸ Solder connections
  • ▸ Ultrasonic welding
  • ▸ IDC (Insulation Displacement)
  • ▸ Mixed termination types

02 Customization Process

01

Requirements Review

Share your specifications, drawings, or sample assemblies. Our engineering team reviews requirements and provides preliminary feedback.

Turnaround: Within 24 hours
02

Design Proposal

Receive detailed proposal with technical specifications, pricing options, and delivery timeline. We optimize for cost and manufacturability.

Turnaround: Within 48 hours
03

Prototyping

Rapid prototyping validates design decisions and ensures specifications are met. Multiple iterations welcome.

Turnaround: 48-72 hours
04

Production & Delivery

Scaled production with consistent quality. Flexible scheduling and inventory management options available.

Lead Time: 2-4 weeks (varies by complexity)

03 Ideal For These Customers

Product Developers

Creating new products requiring custom wire solutions. Engineering support from prototype to production.

OEM Manufacturers

Established brands seeking cost-effective custom wire solutions with consistent quality and reliable delivery.

Contract Manufacturers

CMs needing wire harness expertise and capacity. Seamless integration into your assembly operations.

Growing Companies

Scaling production and transitioning from off-the-shelf to cost-effective custom solutions.

Cost-Conscious Buyers

Replacing expensive branded connectors with fully compatible alternatives without sacrificing quality.

International Buyers

Global companies seeking reliable Chinese manufacturing with English-speaking support and international certifications.

04 Volume-Based Solutions

PROTOTYPE

1-100 Units

Quick-turn manual assembly for design validation and testing.

  • • 48-72 hour turnaround
  • • Design assistance
  • • Flexible iterations

PILOT RUN

100-10K Units

Semi-automated production for pre-production builds and initial market entry.

  • • 1-2 week lead time
  • • Cost optimization
  • • Quality validation

VOLUME PRODUCTION

10K+ Units

Fully automated production with best pricing and consistent quality.

  • • 2-4 week lead time
  • • Lowest unit cost
  • • Production scheduling

Start Your Custom Project

Share your requirements and receive a detailed proposal within 24 hours. No obligation, expert engineering advice included.
